page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
This survey required a lot of help from many people. They include:-
STATISTICS AND COUNTS Peter Whitlock Scout Leader, Mathew Bowman, Nigel Howe, Robert & Stephen Quinn, Damion Hinchliff, Mark Russell, Richard Williams, all of Trinity Scout Group. Chris Hincliff, Scout Leader, Buzzards Scout Troop.
WRITING AND EDITORIAL PRODUCTION Michael, Damion & Chris Hinchliff, Tiffany Fogg, Bulldog Venture Scout Unit. Gavin Fogg, Heath & Reach Scout Troop.
PHOTOGRAPHS: John Fogg.
SAND INDUSTRY INFORMATION: Joseph Arnold & Co. Ltd.
